Description:
Your Dream Home Awaits you in the 'Hartleigh Estate'.
(1P3316) This immaculate 4-bedroom premium family residence has been brilliantly constructed with no expense spared.
Located in the heart of one of Clyde's premium estates, "Harleigh" and backing onto the soon to be completed wetlands, this brand new home is sure to tick all the boxes.
Offering a long list of features including;
- Master bedroom complete with WIR and a huge full ensuite.
- Bedrooms 2 , 3 & 4 are all spacious with BIRs.
- Two living zones comprising of a formal lounge/home theatre, massive open plan living room with vaulted ceilings .
- Modern kitchen with high quality finish & appliances including a S/S 900mm upright oven and stone bench tops.
- plus a gorgeous butler's pantry
- Meals/ living area offers direct access to outdoor area.
- Ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling.
- Double remote garage plus side access, fantastic for tradies, boat or caravan.
- Gorgeous Alfresco area great for entertaining family and friends, low maintenance landscape gardens.
- All on 512 m2 (approx.)block.
The Hartleigh Estate is one of Clyde newest estates. A refined, the area is stealing the limelight with an enviable landscape of parklands and waterways, contemporary retail and sports precincts, established schools and further infrastructure planned. Hartleigh offers growing families and those who've earned time to stop and smell the roses.
Make this your dream home!!
You don't want to miss this opportunity so please call John Lauretta from our office direct to book an appointment
Insights: 23 Hartleigh Street, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2020 and 136 other 4 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Description:
Neat & Complete
Positioned in the ever-popular brilliant Pasadena Estate within close proximity to all amenities you should require, this stunning four-bedroom Carlisle built abode is on offer for the astute buyer. You are welcomed through double doors into a wide entrance and the neutral colour palette sets the tone. The unrivalled 27 square (approx.) family home comprises of modern hostess detailed in stone benchtops, a 900mm five burner cooktop, quality stainless steel appliances, glass splashback, walk in pantry and an abundance of cupboard space. Adjacent, the naturally lit dining space and family living room, completing downstairs a formal lounge, powder room and laundry. Upstairs, accommodates sleeping arrangement, including large master suite with double sink vanity ensuite and walk in robe, remaining three sizeable detailed with built in robes and one with a walk-in robe, perfect for the teens or guests. Servicing upstairs, a stylish modern main bathroom and retreat area.
Through two glass sliding doors from both living and dining room, discover the alfresco area and neat backyard, enough space for all to enjoy outdoors.
Creature comforts include but are not limited to, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, side access to backyard and double remote garage with internal access.
Inspect today and enjoy all that Pasadena has to offer.
Photo I.D required at Open For Inspections.
Insights: 35 Green Gully Road, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2020 and 136 other 4 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Description:
RIPE FOR RENOVATION!
Grab a great opportunity to renovate or develop this quarter acre property in Clyde.
There is potential for development (STCA) or renovation ideal for a tradie
Situated within short distance of proposed train station and proposed town centre.
Within walking distance to Clyde Primary School.
The brick veneer home offers 3 generous bedrooms with built-in robes, shared main bathroom with access also from master bedroom.
2 living areas with wood fire heater, large kitchen with adjoining meals and space for a bar.
A single carport and gated side access to garage and work shed. Also suitable for vehicles, boat, or caravan storage at the rear of the property.
Call to arrange an inspection today!

159m²

Description:
CLASS & CONVENIENCE!
If being walking distance to great shopping options, schools & public transport is at the top of your list of "must haves" then 9 Nebo Way is a MUST SEE!
Whether you are looking for your first home, to downsize or add to your investment portfolio this beautifully presented home will appeal to you.
Arriving home will always be a joy when you're greeted by a classy facade and extremely low maintenance garden.
Entering the the property offers a real sense of style everywhere you look! With the kitchen complete with caeser stone counter tops, loads of storage & stainless steel appliances the chef of the family will certainly be content. The functional living area provides space for an array of furniture options and overlooks the huge pergola thats perfect for entertaining! Also out the back is enough lawn for kids or pets and a neat low maintenance garden.
Upstairs you'll find 3 great sized bedrooms (all with built in robes) Master with ensuite and the other 2 bedrooms serviced by the family bathroom. A handy study nook is also conveniently located at the top of the stairs!
Other features include: A downstairs powder room, gas ducted heating, split system cooling, single remote garage with internal access and much more!
Location really is second to none at this one so make sure it goes to the top of your inspection list to be sure you get a look before its gone!!..
Internal area
135m²

Description:
Modern and elegant with entertaining convenience!
Located in the Eliston Estate you are amongst some of the finest properties within the suburb.
Adorned with the perfect blends of easy-care flooring, this home offers a flowing floorplan and a captivating design, showcasing a lengthy and inviting entrance leading through to an open plan living and dining zone. The kitchen is a dream with its sizable layout and stainless steel appliances, including a 900ml gas stove top and oven, butlers pantry, dishwasher and a further impressing island granite bench.
The master suite entails two walk in robes and en-suite with double vanity, the remaining three bedrooms all boast generous floor space and walk in robes serviced by a well-appointed family bathroom and separate toilet.
An entertainer's delight awaits with an undercover alfresco area and an extended large decked area with a built in BBQ and pizza oven and a backyard that's secure for kids and pets to enjoy.
Further features include:
- Separate theatre room
- Large study
- Double remote garage with internal access
- Well appointed laundry with walk in storage room
- Downlights
What more could you ask for in an all-round family property in its location, conveniently positioned close to shopping centres, both Primary & Secondary schools and public transport.
Internal area
576m²

**UNDER OFFER / UNDER CONTRACT**
Clyde:
.Edgebrook estate
.Heart of clyde
.238m2 with 8.5m frontage
238sqm titled and ready to build in popular location. Whether you are investor or first home buyer, looking to build your dream home or investment property, this descent sized block is for you. at this price point you end total build cost means you will have a very affordable end product.
EDGEBROOK positioned in Clyde, within minutes of the amazing amenities, parks and gardens and only minutes away from the popular Clyde Primary School, Casey RACE Recreation & Aquatic Centre and Casey Indoor Sports Centre! With additional shopping precincts in Pasadena, Selandra Rise/Cascades on Clyde and The Hunt Club local amenities are always going to be close by. Don't forget the recently revamped Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre which offers an abundance of funky cafes and restaurants.
Clyde is located only a short drive from freeway access and all amenities in the townships of Berwick and Cranbourne. The area is surrounded by multiple shopping centres. The town centre of Clyde offers a general store, post office, Schools and a community hall.

Description:
The Family Dream!
Have you ever wonder what it would be like having a shopping centre at your door step?
Well look no further with this delightful 4-year-old home, perfectly located in the Pasadena Estate walking distance to Shopping on Clyde, highlighting all fixtures and fittings of a quality family home.
This luxurious home consists of 3 spacious carpeted bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, extra-large master with walk-in robe and full ensuite. All secondary bedrooms are fitted with built in robe.
This immaculately kept home offers a remarkable floor plan, consisting of an open kitchen equipped with 900mm stainless steel appliances, stone benchtop, dishwasher, oven and loads of cupboard space.
Offering a spacious floorboarded lounge/dining area inclusive of split cooling and ducted heating throughout.
Convenient access from the family dining area to a cemented outdoor area for entertainment all year round with little to no maintenance required.
Local amenities include;
- Clyde Primary School
- Cranbourne East Primary School
- Cranbourne East Secondary College
- Casey Fields
Call Shabana today on 0411 216 186 or Khalil on 0421 711 125 so you do not miss this opportunity.

Description:
NO PROGRESS PAYMENTS! TOP LOCATION!
Located in the prestigious leafy suburb of Clyde, perfectly positioned between both a thriving city and stunning parklands, Parkview on Clyde offers the perfect combination of community and location.
With Melbourne's vibrant city just 48.1kms away, and Shopping on Clyde down the road, residents have plenty of options when it comes to shopping and dining out. A reliable bus and purposed future train network all within walking distance, making travelling to and from the estate a breeze.
This welcoming community offers a wide range of amenities and activities to enjoy, whilst being close to all the local conveniences you need to continue to live an active and low maintenance lifestyle.
A uniquely planned community, this terrific estate will cater to your every need!
Now is the time to take advantage of these quality townhouses which are ideal to live in or for investment.
The amazing benefits of these townhouses are as follows:
• Directly opposite Clyde Primary School
• Within walking distance to the Proposed Clyde Town Centre and Clyde Train Station
• No progress payments
• No Plans for Body Corporate
• Fantastic Rental Income of $370 to $390 per week
• Maximum saving on stamp duty (conditions apply)
• Full advantage of tax depreciation
• Brand new property with upgraded inclusions
• Receive an additional $10,000 Government grant if you are a 1St home buyer
No progress payments!
This is a huge attraction and means up until completion, there will be no loan payments or any loss of money. For example, if you were to build a brand new house and land package with another builder, you will be paying progress payments and would be charged interest during the entire building stage. With Parkview On Clyde, this is not the case. All that is required is a 10% deposit once finance has been approved and the balance of money is only due once your townhouse is completed.
Once completed a tenant will be organised to move in.
For more information visit: www.parkviewonclyde.com.au

Description:
The perfect beginning
Ideally set amongst other lovely homes in a quiet street location is 5 Ayredale Street Clyde!
The perfect first home, ideal investment or down sizers dream, this property is neat and complete in every way with nothing left to do, just move in!
The home will wow you the moment you walk through the front door, with open bright airy spaces to enjoy and modern conveniences throughout.
Comprising 3 generous sized bedrooms with ceiling fans, master suite located to the front of the home finished with walk in robe and ensuite with oversized shower. The two remaining bedrooms are located centrally both with built in robes and are serviced by the main bathroom.
The kitchen is the heart of the home and will impress the most fastidious of buyers with plenty of bench and cupboard space and stainless steel appliances including a 900mm oven and dishwasher.
The dining and living area is adjoining the kitchen is an open plan design allowing you to cook dinner and interact with your guests and kids!
Like to entertain? The home is for you with its fabulous pergola leading out to a beautiful low maintenance landscaped backyard complete with fire pit for the cool nights!
Other stand out features of the home are evaporative cooling, ducted heating, floating timber look floors and double lock up garage with rear access all set on a 392sqm block!
Call to make a time to inspect today!

Quality New Home
If you are looking for your first home, perfect investment property or simply looking to downsize, then this an opportunity you cannot afford to miss. This new design features a tiled entry with direct access into the garage, modern kitchen with quality appliances including a dishwasher which adjoins the tiled meals area and the large open plan living room with a sliding door leading outside to a paved alfresco area. Complete with all floor coverings, plenty of storage throughout, gas heating, fences, driveway, basic landscaping, roller blinds throughout, TV antenna, clothesline and even a letterbox. Do not miss this opportunity.

Description:
SOLD BY BRANDON WHITTA!
Clyde: Located in the prestigious and tightly held Eliston estate sits this impressive first home, downsizing or investing opportunity.
A top tier home in a top tier estate, the open floor plan offers 2 living areas, quality fittings and fixtures and 5 robed bedrooms, the large master providing a full en-suite.
The boutique kitchen is complete with quality stainless steel appliances including 900mm range hood, 5 burner gas cook top and feature glass splash back, not to mention the ample cupboard storage and bench space and microwave provision! All of this is positioned to overlook your separate meals and rear living zone.
Added features include: internal access, easy to maintain rear & front yards, ducted heating & cooling plus much more!
While you take the time to appreciate the care and effort that has gone into making this residence the perfect family home you will notice the quality flows both internally and externally.
Surrounded by top end properties and is within walking distance to parks and playgrounds, this home boasts convenience.
Positioned within a short drive to all amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne. A short drive away from freeway access en route to the Melbourne CBD, the popular Clyde Primary School, Casey Fields football ground/Casey Race aquatic centre and the Town Centre. Not to mention just minutes away from the Eden Rise and Selandra Rise shopping centres providing child care and award winning cafes plus much more!
From front to back this home was completed with an exceptional eye for detail and will be the perfect residence for those that expect nothing but the best!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW! - *PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS*

Description:
NO PROGRESS PAYMENTS! TOP LOCATION!
Located in the prestigious leafy suburb of Clyde, perfectly positioned between both a thriving city and stunning parklands, Parkview on Clyde offers the perfect combination of community and location.
With Melbourne's vibrant city just 48.1kms away, and Shopping on Clyde down the road, residents have plenty of options when it comes to shopping and dining out. A reliable bus and purposed future train network all within walking distance, making travelling to and from the estate a breeze.
This welcoming community offers a wide range of amenities and activities to enjoy, whilst being close to all the local conveniences you need to continue to live an active and low maintenance lifestyle.
A uniquely planned community, this terrific estate will cater to your every need!
Now is the time to take advantage of these quality townhouses which are ideal to live in or for investment.
The amazing benefits of these townhouses are as follows:
• Directly opposite Clyde Primary School
• Within walking distance to the Proposed Clyde Town Centre and Clyde Train Station
• No progress payments
• No Plans for Body Corporate
• Fantastic Rental Income of $370 to $390 per week
• Maximum saving on stamp duty (conditions apply)
• Full advantage of tax depreciation
• Brand new property with upgraded inclusions
• Receive an additional $10,000 Government grant if you are a 1St home buyer
No progress payments!
This is a huge attraction and means up until completion, there will be no loan payments or any loss of money. For example, if you were to build a brand new house and land package with another builder, you will be paying progress payments and would be charged interest during the entire building stage. With Parkview On Clyde, this is not the case. All that is required is a 10% deposit once finance has been approved and the balance of money is only due once your townhouse is completed.
Once completed a tenant will be organised to move in.
For more information visit: www.parkviewonclyde.com.au
Privacy: Your entry to this property provides consent to the collection and use of personal information for security purposes. It may also be used to provide you with further information about the property, other properties and services marketed by Eview Group | Casey Estate Agents. Description:
ELITE LIVING ELITE PRESENTATION
Welcome to 54 Aintree Close, Clyde! A complete package with all the finest finishes! Built by Inspired Homes and nestled in the highly sought after Hartleigh Estate you will absolutely love coming home to this one!
The first of the high level features are evident upon arrival with the striking façade and classy landscaping that give the ultimate street appeal! Entering the home is just as pleasant as arriving as you are greeted with 4 large bedrooms plus a seperate study (two of which are fitted with full ensuites, PERFECT for having guests) while the other two bedrooms are serviced by the high end family bathroom and separate toilet.
If multiple large living zones is a must have on your checklist then you wont be disappointed here! Not 1, not 2, not 3 BUT FOUR genuine living areas are to be found! Including a formal lounge, theatre/rumpus, retreat zone and the large family area set amongst the kitchen and meals.
If a high end kitchen is important to you, well, thats here too! Complete with butlers pantry, large island bench with 40mm caeser stone counter top, 900mm freestanding gas cooker and all the storage options youve always wished you had!
Year round comfort is certainly assured with both gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling fitted within the home. Other notable features on this spectacular home include 9ft raised ceilings throughout, LED downlights, a 6 star energy rating, oversized double garage and much more!
If entertaining outside is more your style that is also covered with a generous alfresco space and plenty of yard for pets or kids to enjoy!!
54 Aintree Close is conveniently located close to multiple shopping centres, a great selection of schools and with easy access to the Monash freeway.
This beautifully presented home is an opportunity not to be missed! Add this address to your must inspect list NOW!
Internal area
30m²

Description:
SOLD BY BRANDON WHITTA!
Clyde: Located in the prestigious and tightly held Hartleigh estate sits this impressive first home or downsizing opportunity.
A top tier home in a top tier estate, the open floor plan offers 3 robed bedrooms, the large master providing a full en-suite with over sized shower space and walk in robe.
The boutique kitchen is complete with quality stainless steel appliances including 600mm range hood, 4-burner gas cook top and tiled splash back, not to mention the ample cupboard storage and bench space! All of this is positioned to overlook your separate meals and rear living zone.
Added features include: internal access, easy to maintain rear & front yards, ducted heating & split system cooling plus much more!
While you take the time to appreciate the care and effort that has gone into making this residence the perfect family home you will notice the quality flows both internally and externally.
Surrounded by top end properties and is within walking distance to parks and playgrounds, this home boasts convenience.
Positioned within a short drive to all amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne. A short drive away from freeway access en route to the Melbourne CBD, the popular Clyde Primary School, Casey Fields football ground/Casey Race aquatic centre and the Town Centre. Not to mention just minutes away from the Eden Rise and Selandra Rise shopping centres providing child care and award winning cafes plus much more!
From front to back this home was completed with an exceptional eye for detail and will be the perfect residence for those that expect nothing but the best!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW! - *PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS*

Description:
5 Acre at Spectacular Location !!
PSP Property Group is excited to offer this amazing opportunity to purchase
this 2.02 hectare (5 acres*) land parcel, located in Clyde.
SITE DESCRIPTION
Currently Zoned UGZ , This 5 acre land is rare opportunity not to be missed.
LOCATION;
Located 48 km from Melbourne CBD in Clyde.
Close to schools like Casey Grammar School, Clyde Primary School, Cranbourne swimming
pool, Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre and Cranbourne station which is a 12-minute drive.
KEY FEATURES
• A rare land banking or development opportunity
• Easy access to the Melbourne CBD
• Close to all amenities
• Close proximity to Cranbourne
• Clyde South PSP
• Directly opposite to proposed train station
and major town centre

Description:
Great Starter Home or Ideal Investment!
Only 4 years young this well-presented family home is sure to impress Located within close proximity of all amenities, only minutes away from Shopping on Clyde, Casey Race, Pasadena Park, Medical Centre, Bus Stops and Schooling is this great opportunity for a first home buyer, downsizer or astute investor looking for a guaranteed secure rental return with a happy tenant willing to extend their lease.
From the moment you walk in you will feel at home, welcoming you to the modern, open plan living consisting of a formal living area, the hostess kitchen with walk-in pantry, good fridge space and breakfast bar overlooking the meals area. Comprising of three bedrooms, the master bedroom with full-ensuite and walk-in robe. Other bedrooms with built-in robes and central to the main bathroom, toilet and laundry.
Further comforts of this home are ducted heating and evaporative cooling, a single remote garage with the security benefit of internal access. Make your way outdoors to the lovely alfresco area, ideal for entertaining guests amongst the backyard with plenty of room for the kids to run around in.
Young in age with the convenience of a central locality, this is a fantastic opportunity not to be missed!
